description: Marathon was a coastal deme of the tribe Aiantis, in northeastern Attica, the site of the Battle of Marathon in 490 BC, and capital of the Marathon tetrapolis.
details: The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: Plasi NW (prehistoric acropolis?) [IX - coast - 10]
